content: Great app. I use it to polar align and it works perfectly.

I realized after a year of using this app once or twice a week that I needed to go ahead and purchase the PRO version. It just works. Makes setting up my Sky-Watcher Pro tracking mount a breeze. App offers different "brackets" depending on what mount / scope you might be using. Other than that, the app is simple and just does what I need it to do. Thanks for this!
replyContent: Thank you! In the next version I have also added a short user guide. Clear skies.

content: Great app! Gives all the info necessary for a really accurate polar alignment.
